prove-status-before-reporting.header: Before you report an error with your eVisa
prove-status-before-reporting.prove-your-immigration-status: You can view your eVisa and get a share code to prove your immigration status online (opens in new tab).
prove-status-before-reporting.use-this-service: You can use this service to:
prove-status-before-reporting.step1: view your eVisa (online immigration status) - this shows what rights you have in the UK, for example to work, rent or claim benefits
prove-status-before-reporting.step2: get a share code to prove your immigration status to other people, for example employers, landlords or airline staff
prove-status-before-reporting.get-help: You can also ask for help (opens in new tab).
prove-status-before-reporting.header2: If there is still a problem
prove-status-before-reporting.continue-report-error: You can continue to report an error with your eVisa.
prove-status-before-reporting.finish-and-return: Finish and return to GOV.UK

update-details-before-reporting.header: Before you report an error with your eVisa
update-details-before-reporting.update-your-ukvi-account-details: You can update your UK Visas and Immigration account details (opens in new tab).
update-details-before-reporting.service-info: This service will only update your UKVI account details. You cannot update any immigration details, for example change a visa or citizenship application.
update-details-before-reporting.get-help: You can also ask for help (opens in new tab) updating your UKVI account details.
update-details-before-reporting.header2: If there is still a problem
update-details-before-reporting.continue-report-error: You can continue to report an error with your eVisa.
update-details-before-reporting.finish-and-return: Finish and return to GOV.UK

before-reporting.header: Before you report an error with your eVisa
before-reporting.check-three-steps-for-access: Check that you have completed the 3 steps to get get access to your eVisa.
before-reporting.step3: Link your eVisa to your account
before-reporting.once-you-have-access: Once you have access to your eVisa, you can sign in to your UKVI account to view your eVisa and prove your immigration status.
before-reporting.header2: If you cannot get into your account
before-reporting.get-help: Get help if you're having problems signing into your account.

travel-document-details.intro: Tell us the details of the document you will use to travel to the UK.

more-details.header: Provide more details about the error with your eVisa
more-details.intro: Tell us what you were trying to do and what went wrong.
more-details.step1: what visa or immigration status you expected to see
more-details.step3: any error messages or problems you saw
more-details.intro-continued: This helps us understand the issue and how to fix it.

personal-details.intro: You must enter these details exactly as they appear on your eVisa so we can review the problem.

contact.header: How should we contact you about your eVisa?

someone-else-details.intro: We will attempt to contact the requestor directly. We will only use these details to contact you if needed.
someone-else-details.consent: By continuing, you confirm that you have consent to send this request on their behalf.

check-answers.header: Check your answers before sending your request

send-request.disclaimer: By sending your request you are confirming that, to the best of your knowledge, the details you are providing are correct.
send-request.link-text: how the Home Office uses your personal information

completing-for-someone-else.header: Details of person completing this form on behalf of another

trying-to-do.label: What are you trying to do?

detail-restrictions.label: What you can and cannot do in the UK

completing-for-someone-else.label: Are you completing this form on behalf of someone else?

describe-evisa-error.label: Provide more details about the error with your eVisa

accessibility.header: Accessibility statement for Error correction service form
